description.narrative: The objective of the project is to improve energy efficiency of selected coal-fired power generation units through renovation and modernization (R&M) and improved operations and maintenance (O&M).

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement, Schedule 2, Section I. 4 | Description :Within 30 days of Loan Agreement effectiveness, MoP andCEA shall enter into the Grant Implementation Agreement | Due Date :19-Apr-2008

Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement, Schedule 2, Section II, A | Description :Borrwer, thru Proj Implemntng entities & CEA, shallmonitr & evaluate progrs of Proj & prepare Proj Rpts covering 1 FY qtr, furnshdto Bank not later than 45 days after end of periodcovrd by such rpt | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement, Schedule 2, Section II, B. 2 | Description :Borrwr shall have its Financl Statmnts audited, eachaudit covers 1 FY, commencing w/ FY 1st withdrwl was made, & furnshd to Bank not later than 6 months after end of such period. |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement, Schedule 2, Section II, B. 3 | Description :Borrwr shall ensure Proj Implemntng Entities & CEAprepare & furnsh to Bank not later than 45 days after end of each FY qtr, interim unaudited financial rpts, covering the qtr,satisfctry to Bank. | Frequency :Quarterly
Finance Agreement :Project Agreements | Description :Implementing entities shall adopt Corporate Governance and FinancialAccountability Action Plans | Due Date :09-Mar-2011

Finance Agreement :Project Agreements | Description :Implementing entities shall endorse and disclose results of EnvironmentalAssessment and Due Diligence Reports (EADDR), and of Rapid Social Assessments (RSA) | Due Date :30-Apr-2012
